starters.name: Garlic Bread

starters.name: Caprese Salad
starters.description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

starters.name: Chicken Wings
starters.description: Spicy or BBQ chicken wings served with ranch dressing.

starters.name: Bruschetta
starters.description: Diced tomatoes, fresh basil, and garlic on grilled bread.

starters.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
starters.description: Creamy dip with spinach, artichokes, and melted cheese, served with tortilla chips.

main_course.name: Grilled Salmon
main_course.description: Salmon fillet seasoned and grilled to perfection.

main_course.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
main_course.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served with rice.

main_course.name: Steak Fajitas
main_course.description: Grilled steak with bell peppers and onions, served with tortillas and salsa.

main_course.name: Chicken Parmesan

drinks.name: Classic Mojito

drinks.name: Berry Blast Smoothie
drinks.description: Mixed berries blended with yogurt and honey.

drinks.description: Refreshing mocktail with mango, pineapple, and citrus flavors.

drinks.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
drinks.description: Espresso with vanilla syrup, milk, and caramel drizzle over ice.
